page.title: 11Aspenden Festival
page.content:
In the 1950s and 1960s many parish chuches began to hold Flower Festivals to make the churches look beautiful and to raise money for costly repairs.
The Aspenden Festival grew out of this custom. Each year the Committee runs an Arts Festival with a varied programme which has included musical and dramatic performances of a very high standard.
As St. Mary's, Aspenden, is remote and parking space is very limited, local schools lend their minibuses and a free service is offered from Buntingford during the Festival.
